price: Su Dios es un Dios Único, no hay divinidad [con derecho a ser adorada] salvo Él, el Compasivo, el Misericordioso.
arabic: وَإِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun lā ilāha illā huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
